channel.title: Manifest needs you to go immortal.
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Manifest needs you to go immortal."

item.title: Re: Manifest needs you to go immortal.
item.content:encoded: Everythin ready, 49 Members. If u come today u have the STI tommorrow ;)

item.title: Re: Manifest needs you to go immortal.
item.content:encoded:
Lost some people again somehow..

We still need more people. Everything else is set for blwing up Manifest this Weekend.

Please come and help us out, Kaiju Drops can be won again..

Hope to see u soon in Manifest, thx :)

item.title: Re: Manifest needs you to go immortal.
item.content:encoded: when switching villages do you need to wait 48 hours or wait for Dayroll two days after you left

item.title: Re: Manifest needs you to go immortal.
item.content:encoded:
Number of Ninja: 36

I will be putting in a application (JuanSolid) in hopes of Kaiju drops and exploding :D. 1st season Chunin, who should be a Sp. Jonin.

Looking forward to seeing you all in the village!

item.title: Re: Manifest needs you to go immortal.
item.content:encoded:
i'll join. i have left my village and need to wait until Wednesday.

*edit* also how close are you to doing the impossible mission Drizz?

item.title: Re: Manifest needs you to go immortal.
item.content:encoded: Well, I'll join tomorrow if there isn't any trouble.

item.title: Re: Manifest needs you to go immortal.
item.content:encoded:
I'm jonin, and won't be able to be in the new village, is that a problem? if not, then I'll join either today or tomorrow.

KazeNR

item.title: Re: Manifest needs you to go immortal.
item.content:encoded: ill use my non main and see if its better than my old village :)

item.title: Re: Manifest needs you to go immortal.
item.content:encoded: I will join, name will be ahiok1, my new alt, if you want send an alt to Osaka village :D

item.title: Re: Manifest needs you to go immortal.
item.content:encoded:
Now for sure that's no problem. Just come and join ;)

All the others as well please, we really need shinobis.

I'm also willing to do an alt swap for sure. Just contact me or send ur alt in our village and I'll send one of mine to yours..

Thanks for ur help. We need it *g*

item.title: Re: Manifest needs you to go immortal.
item.content:encoded: I'm very interested in joining your village to help it explode, but I'm only on season one; is this a problem?

item.title: Manifest needs you to go immortal.
item.content:encoded:
Hi there

Our village Manifest Village, the village hidden in the woods has every possible upgrade. But we're lacking of new members since a small group left.

We are epic, and as I said we have everything a young shinobi could dream of.

And in a week or so if we get enough members we are even going to explode finally. So come join us and u get the impossible theme for free :)

Thx for your help.

[edit] I forgot: we also have a lot of Kaijus (at least one per day) and more important; we have Kaijudrops in the storehouse for the first three members to join us for free (u can choose which). And a good bonus system so u can easily win more Kaiju Drops. U can only win if you come to Manifest ;)
